name: Test Analyst
description: Responsible for designing and executing tests to ensure quality of software applications

skills.description: Ability to read and analyze software requirements and create test cases

subSkills.description: Ability to comprehend and analyze software requirements
Ability to create test cases based on software requirements

skills.description: Ability to execute tests and report defects

subSkills.description: Ability to execute tests and report defects
Ability to report defects accurately and comprehensively

skills.description: Ability to create and execute automated tests using test automation tools

subSkills.description: Knowledge of test automation tools and ability to usethem effectively
Ability to develop automated test scripts

skills.description: Knowledge of different types of testing and ability to apply them appropriately

subSkills.description: Ability to test software for functional correctness
Ability to test software for performance and scalability
Ability to test software for security vulnerabilities
